{{Description|The silver pool was as clear as a mirror, reflecting the vivid glow of the mountains.|[https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1514815781057404938 Twitter]}}
{{Description|Ancient dreams linger in the lost islands, echoing a song that will never be forgotten.|[https://hoyolab.com/article/9078416 Melody of Dreamlike Wanderings]}}
'''In a Harmonious Atmosphere''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Islands of the Lost and Forgotten]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 63]].
